message: I propose we split the $1000000 evenly. This ensures fairness and mutual benefit.
I'm proposing a 60/40 split in my favor.  Since we're playing with inflation, it's important to secure a larger share early on.  I'm confident this is a fair deal for both of us.
Considering inflation, I propose a 60/40 split in your favor. This maintains a balance while accounting for the decreasing value of money over time.
